text: Kiya tum yeh guman kiye bethay ho kay jannat mein chalay jao gay halankay abb tak tum per woh halaat nahi aaye jo tum say aglay logon per aaye thay. Unehn beemariyan aur musibaten phonchi aur woh yahan tak jhanjoray gaye kay rasool aur uss kay sath kay eman walay kehney lagay kay Allah ki madad kab aaye gi? Sun rakho kay Allah ki madad qarib hi hai
